plot outline: Life In Park Street' captures the cosmopolitan nature of Park Street in Kolkata. Disha's parents Radhika and Arindam are separated. Radhika gets into a relationship with a pimp. Arindam with someone else. Disha's boyfriend Pushan is sexually exploited by gay patrons. At the end Pushan quits his job. Arindam and Radhika are united. Park Street thus witnesses the ups and downs of several lives.
title: Life in Park Street
